You received this message because there was a request to change the email address you use to access your Gothic account.

Please click the button below to confirm and change your email to: bar@example.com http://test.example.com:3000/change/email/#1234567890asdfghjklqwertyuiopzxcvbnm=

Once confirmed, your login email will change to the new address. If you did not request this change, no further action is required. You can safely ignore this message.

Need help, or have questions? Please contact support. Do not reply to this email.

Thanks,
